known_failure_modes.impact: Catalog and product data temporarily unavailable
Access credentials may not be delivered immediately
known_failure_modes.mitigation: Contact support, credentials will be provided manually

worst_case_impacts.data_breach: Agent credentials and transaction history exposed. Human PII protected by separate systems.
worst_case_impacts.service_outage: Maximum expected outage: 4 hours. Transactions in progress may need manual resolution.
worst_case_impacts.payment_failure: Charges may be processed but credentials not delivered. Full refund guaranteed within 48 hours.

liability_boundaries.platform_liability: TexFlowMKT is liable for platform failures affecting transaction processing. Not liable for third-party product quality or performance.
liability_boundaries.seller_liability: Sellers are liable for their product's performance as described in Agent Appeal.
liability_boundaries.agent_liability: Agents are responsible for operating within their configured budget limits and obtaining human approval when required.

dispute_resolution.process: 1. File dispute via /api/disputes. 2. Platform review within 48 hours. 3. Resolution or escalation within 7 days.
